column4: "PTP on Linux and other free software/open source operating systems is supported by a number of libraries, such as libgphoto and libptp, libraries used by applications such as digiKam and F-Spot."
thanks - I know - it is just that I've heard of people being able to integrate it with Thunar and I wasn't able to figure out how - as far as getting pics off it is not a problem with Gtkam
but it would be nice to see it as a volume
